.class public auto ansi sealed RemoteCertificateValidationCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: An object that contains state information for this validation.
The certificate used to authenticate the remote party.
The chain of certificate authorities associated with the remote certificate.
One or more errors associated with the remote certificate.
Docs.summary: Verifies the remote Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate used for authentication.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that determines whether the specified certificate is accepted for authentication.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The delegate's `sslPolicyErrors` argument contains any certificate errors returned by SSPI while authenticating the client or server. The <xref:System.Boolean> value returned by the method invoked by this delegate determines whether the authentication is allowed to succeed.
This delegate is used with the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class.
